title: Protect Our Community
tagline: Contact your representatives in Northern Ireland about the issues that matter to you.
subject: Urgent: Community concerns from your constituent
body:
Dear Representative,

I am writing as your constituent to express my concerns about issues affecting our community in Northern Ireland.

As someone who lives in this area, I believe it is important that our elected representatives understand the challenges we face and work to address them.

I would appreciate your consideration of these matters and look forward to your response.

Yours sincerely,
{{name}}
{{postcode}}
